content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":112871,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぎゃあああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugyahhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":112872,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランスさん！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"R-Rance-san!?\""},{"lineNumber":112873,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、俺様のニミッツに近づくとは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously, to come close to my Nimitz,"},{"lineNumber":112874,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふてぇ野郎だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"that's a gutsy bastard.\""},{"lineNumber":112875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、俺様の……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-my...\""},{"lineNumber":112876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ、じゃなくて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, no, wait!\""},{"lineNumber":112877,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、あの……アマデス君……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, um... Amades-kun...\""},{"lineNumber":112878,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の地元の、と、友達です……","translatedEnglishLine":"He's a friend from my hometown...\""},{"lineNumber":112879,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに、いい人、ですよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides, he's a good person...\""},{"lineNumber":112880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いーや、騙されてはいかん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, don't be fooled."},{"lineNumber":112881,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああいうのが案外裏では何してるか分からんのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Those types are often up to who knows what behind the scenes.\""},{"lineNumber":112882,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well,"},{"lineNumber":112883,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ニミッツが毒牙にかけられる前で良かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm glad my Nimitz got away before falling victim.\""},{"lineNumber":112884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……えー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh... uhh...\""},{"lineNumber":112885,"originalJapaneseLine":"これ以降、アマデスはランスには","translatedEnglishLine":"From then on, Amades avoided approaching Rance."},{"lineNumber":112886,"originalJapaneseLine":"近づかないようになった。","translatedEnglishLine":"He made sure not to come near him."},{"lineNumber":112887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむ！　あれは！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm-mmm! What is that!?\""},{"lineNumber":112888,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが廊下で何かを見つけた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance spotted something in the hallway."},{"lineNumber":112889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすくす……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heheh..."},{"lineNumber":112890,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、そうなの」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, that's how it is.\""},{"lineNumber":112891,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、それが妹も大喜びで」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, my little sister was very pleased with that.\""},{"lineNumber":112892,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、それなら良かったわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, if that's the case, then I'm glad.\""},{"lineNumber":112893,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスとアマデスの二人が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Merufeisu and Amades were calmly chatting together."},{"lineNumber":112894,"originalJapaneseLine":"穏やかに談笑していた。","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":112895,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、む、む……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-m-m...\""},{"lineNumber":112896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむむむむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mum-mum-mum-mum...\""},{"lineNumber":112897,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、メルフェイス先生、また」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, Merufeisu-sensei, see you again.\""},{"lineNumber":112898,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、またね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, see you then.\""},{"lineNumber":112899,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":112900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew...\""},{"lineNumber":112901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、貴様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you there.\""},{"lineNumber":112902,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":112903,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……なんでしょう？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, um... what is it?"},{"lineNumber":112904,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなところでお話とは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Talking in a place like this...\""},{"lineNumber":112905,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メルフェイスちゃんのことだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's about Merufeisu-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":112906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「先生のこと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"About the teacher?\""},{"lineNumber":112907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You!\""},{"lineNumber":112908,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さてはメルフェイスちゃんを狙ってるな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"So you're after Merufeisu-chan, aren't you!\""},{"lineNumber":112909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh?\""},{"lineNumber":112910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええええええええええ！？！？！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehhhhhh!?!?!?!\""},{"lineNumber":112911,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、とんでもありません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no way!\""},{"lineNumber":112912,"originalJapaneseLine":"「嘘をつくんじゃない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't lie!"},{"lineNumber":112913,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メルフェイスをいやらしい目で","translatedEnglishLine":"You're staring at Merufeisu with lewd eyes!"},{"lineNumber":112914,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じろじろと見おって！」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":112915,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昔、セックスしたことがあるようだが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seems you once had sex in the past..."},{"lineNumber":112916,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんなのただの治療、思い上がるなよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was just treatment, don't get cocky.\""},{"lineNumber":112917,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そこまでご存じだったんですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-you knew that much...?\""},{"lineNumber":112918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに、俺の、ということは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And 'my', that means..."},{"lineNumber":112919,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もしや、ランス総統は――","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be, Supreme Commander Rance is—"},{"lineNumber":112920,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メルフェイス先生の恋人か何かで？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Merufeisu-sensei's lover or something?\""},{"lineNumber":112921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":112922,"originalJapaneseLine":"（嘘だが）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Though it's a lie.)"},{"lineNumber":112923,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう、だったんですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see... so that was it...\""},{"lineNumber":112924,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは、僕のような存在は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In that case, someone like me"},{"lineNumber":112925,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目障りに映ります、よね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"must seem like an annoyance, right...?\""},{"lineNumber":112926,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、わきまえてるではないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, you're not without sense.\""},{"lineNumber":112927,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、でも、僕がメルフェイス先生を――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but, as for me and Merufeisu-sensei—"},{"lineNumber":112928,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんていうのはまったくの誤解です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"that's a complete misunderstanding!\""},{"lineNumber":112929,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当かぁ〜？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really now~?"},{"lineNumber":112930,"originalJapaneseLine":"　疑わしきは罰せよとも言うしな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"They say 'innocent until proven guilty'— or maybe it's the other way around...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、俺様のニミッツに近づくとは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, to come close to my Nimitz,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の地元の、と、友達です……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's a friend from my hometown..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいうのが案外裏では何してるか分からんのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those types are often up to who knows what behind the scenes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツが毒牙にかけられる前で良かった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm glad my Nimitz got away before falling victim."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以降、アマデスはランスには
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From then on, Amades avoided approaching Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近づかないようになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He made sure not to come near him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが廊下で何かを見つけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance spotted something in the hallway.
"Yes, my little sister was very pleased with that."
"Hehe, if that's the case, then I'm glad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスとアマデスの二人が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Merufeisu and Amades were calmly chatting together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穏やかに談笑していた。
「では、メルフェイス先生、また」
こんなところでお話とは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talking in a place like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メルフェイスちゃんのことだ」
さてはメルフェイスちゃんを狙ってるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you're after Merufeisu-chan, aren't you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスをいやらしい目で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're staring at Merufeisu with lewd eyes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔、セックスしたことがあるようだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seems you once had sex in the past...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなのただの治療、思い上がるなよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was just treatment, don't get cocky."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そこまでご存じだったんですか……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be, Supreme Commander Rance is—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイス先生の恋人か何かで？」
目障りに映ります、よね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: must seem like an annoyance, right...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、わきまえてるではないか」
「で、でも、僕がメルフェイス先生を――
なんていうのはまったくの誤解です！」
疑わしきは罰せよとも言うしな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say 'innocent until proven guilty'— or maybe it's the other way around..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、俺様のニミッツに近づくとは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, to come close to my Nimitz,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の地元の、と、友達です……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's a friend from my hometown..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいうのが案外裏では何してるか分からんのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those types are often up to who knows what behind the scenes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツが毒牙にかけられる前で良かった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm glad my Nimitz got away before falling victim."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以降、アマデスはランスには
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From then on, Amades avoided approaching Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近づかないようになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He made sure not to come near him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが廊下で何かを見つけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance spotted something in the hallway.
"Yes, my little sister was very pleased with that."
"Hehe, if that's the case, then I'm glad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスとアマデスの二人が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Merufeisu and Amades were calmly chatting together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穏やかに談笑していた。
「では、メルフェイス先生、また」
こんなところでお話とは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talking in a place like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メルフェイスちゃんのことだ」
さてはメルフェイスちゃんを狙ってるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you're after Merufeisu-chan, aren't you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスをいやらしい目で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're staring at Merufeisu with lewd eyes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔、セックスしたことがあるようだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seems you once had sex in the past...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなのただの治療、思い上がるなよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was just treatment, don't get cocky."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そこまでご存じだったんですか……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be, Supreme Commander Rance is—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイス先生の恋人か何かで？」
目障りに映ります、よね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: must seem like an annoyance, right...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、わきまえてるではないか」
「で、でも、僕がメルフェイス先生を――
なんていうのはまったくの誤解です！」
疑わしきは罰せよとも言うしな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say 'innocent until proven guilty'— or maybe it's the other way around..."
